original_title: I've Been with a Male Escort
overview: On her 30th birthday, a woman's best friend indulge her in the most outrageous of gifts. A male escort. And he doesn't disappoint! Erika Lust directs Matisse and Liandra Dahl in this most unspoken of desire.
tagline: Have you tried the ultimate taboo?
title: I've Been with a Male Escort
